https://openminds.om-i.org/props/additio._instruction: Enter any additional remarks concerning this grid volume.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/additio.description: Mention of what deserves additional attention or notice.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/additio.label: Additional remarks
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/additio.name: additionalRemarks

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/capture._instruction: Add the device used to capture this grid volume.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/capture.label: Captured with
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/capture.name: capturedWith

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/coordin._instruction: Add the coordinate space in which this grid volume exists.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/coordin.label: Coordinate framework
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/coordin.name: coordinateFramework

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/dataLoc._instruction: Add a reference to the file to which this grid volume information applies. If the information applies uniformly to a grid volume file series, a reference to the corresponding file bundle may be provided instead.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/dataLoc.label: Data location
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/dataLoc.name: dataLocation

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/dimensi._instruction: Enter the dimension of this grid volume.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/dimensi.label: Dimension
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/dimensi.name: dimension

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name._instruction: Enter a descriptive name of this grid volume preferably matching the filename.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.label: Name
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.name: name

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/numberO._instruction: Enter number of planes in this grid volume.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/numberO.label: Number of planes
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/numberO.name: numberOfPlanes

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/voxelSi._instruction: Enter the physical voxel size for this grid volume (in x,y,z order).
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/voxelSi.description: Extent of the discrete elements comprising a three-dimensional entity.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/voxelSi.label: Voxel size
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/voxelSi.name: voxelSize
